question: On the Day of Judgement, the followers of Muhammad-ur-Rasoolullah s.a.w.s. will get a drink of “Kauser” from his hands, how about the followers of other Prophets?
answer:
QUESTION
Will they suffer of thirst along with the Mushrikeen/Munafiqeen of the Ummat of Rasullah s.a.w.s. or would they have a different system?
ANSWER


Share:
In a Hadith recorded in Mishkaat, pg.493, Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi
Wasallam) had mentioned, 'Every Nabi (Alayhis salaam) will have his
pond/fountain. From his houdh, he will give drink to his followers.'

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Moulana Imraan Vawda
FATWA DEPT.

CHECKED AND APPROVED CORRECT: Mufti Ebrahim Desai
